title: "Researchers say AI model accurately identifies, predicts joint damage in hand X-rays"
excerpt: "New research at ACR Convergence 2023, the American College of Rheumatology's (ACR) annual meeting, shows that a deep learning system could accurately identify and predict joint space narrowing and erosions in hand radiographs of patients with rheumatoid arthritis (RA)."
